schemes.name: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi
schemes.benefits: ₹6,000 per year in 3 installments of ₹2,000 each directly to bank account
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply online at pmkisan.gov.in or visit nearest Common Service Centre (CSC)

schemes.name: MGNREGA
schemes.nameHindi: महात्मा गांधी राष्ट्रीय ग्रामीण रोजगार गारंटी अधिनियम
schemes.benefits: 100 days of guaranteed wage employment per year to rural households
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply at Gram Panchayat office for job card, then request work

schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY)
schemes.benefits: Free health insurance coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for hospitalization
schemes.applicationProcess: Check eligibility at pmjay.gov.in or visit nearest Ayushman Mitra at empanelled hospital

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin
schemes.benefits: Financial assistance of ₹1.20 lakh for plain areas and ₹1.30 lakh for hilly areas to build pucca house
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through Gram Panchayat or online at pmayg.nic.in

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
schemes.benefits: Crop insurance covering losses due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through bank, CSC, or insurance company portal within crop season

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.benefits: Low-interest credit facility for agricultural needs up to ₹3 lakh at 4% interest
schemes.applicationProcess: Visit any bank branch with documents and fill KCC application form

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
schemes.benefits: Free LPG connection with financial assistance for first refill and stove
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply at nearest LPG distributor or online at pmuy.gov.in

schemes.name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
schemes.benefits: High-interest savings scheme for girl child with tax benefits, current interest ~8%
schemes.applicationProcess: Open account at post office or authorized bank with minimum ₹250

schemes.name: Janani Suraksha Yojana
schemes.benefits: Cash assistance for institutional delivery: ₹1,400 in rural areas, ₹1,000 in urban areas
schemes.applicationProcess: Register at nearest Anganwadi or health center during pregnancy

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
schemes.benefits: Life insurance cover of ₹2 lakh at premium of ₹436 per year
schemes.applicationProcess: Enroll through your bank by filling form and giving auto-debit consent

schemes.name: Mid-Day Meal Scheme
schemes.benefits: Free nutritious lunch to school children in government and aided schools
schemes.applicationProcess: Automatic for all children enrolled in government/aided schools

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
schemes.benefits: Business loans up to ₹10 lakh for micro enterprises without collateral
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply at any bank or NBFC with business plan and documents

schemes.name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
schemes.nameHindi: दीन दयाल उपाध्याय ग्रामीण कौशल्य योजना
schemes.benefits: Free skill training and placement assistance for rural youth
schemes.applicationProcess: Register at ddugky.gov.in or contact nearest Project Implementing Agency

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana
schemes.benefits: Pension scheme for senior citizens with assured 7.4% return per annum
schemes.applicationProcess: Purchase from Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) with investment up to ₹15 lakh

schemes.name: National Social Assistance Programme
schemes.benefits: Monthly pension of ₹200-500 for elderly, widows, and persons with disabilities
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through Gram Panchayat or urban local body

schemes.name: Rashtriya Vayoshri Yojana
schemes.benefits: Free assistive devices like walking sticks, wheelchairs, hearing aids for senior citizens
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through district social welfare office or online portal

schemes.name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
schemes.benefits: Awareness campaign and incentives for girl child education and welfare
schemes.applicationProcess: Benefits through various schemes, awareness at Anganwadi and schools

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
schemes.benefits: Free soil testing and health card with fertilizer recommendations
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply at nearest soil testing lab or agriculture department office

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Urban
schemes.benefits: Subsidy on home loans and financial assistance for EWS/LIG categories in urban areas
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply online at pmaymis.gov.in or through approved lending institutions

schemes.name: Stand-Up India Scheme
schemes.benefits: Bank loans between ₹10 lakh to ₹1 crore for SC/ST/Women entrepreneurs
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through standupmitra portal or visit bank branch

schemes.name: Atal Pension Yojana
schemes.benefits: Guaranteed pension of ₹1,000 to ₹5,000 per month after age 60
schemes.applicationProcess: Enroll through your bank by filling APY form

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana
schemes.benefits: Accident insurance cover of ₹2 lakh at premium of ₹20 per year
schemes.applicationProcess: Enroll through your bank with auto-debit consent

schemes.name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme
schemes.benefits: Stipend support and on-the-job training for apprentices
schemes.applicationProcess: Register at apprenticeshipindia.gov.in and apply for opportunities

schemes.name: Post Matric Scholarship for SC/ST
schemes.nameHindi: अनुसूचित जाति/जनजाति के लिए पोस्ट मैट्रिक छात्रवृत्ति
schemes.benefits: Financial assistance for SC/ST students pursuing higher education
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through National Scholarship Portal (scholarships.gov.in)

schemes.name: Post Matric Scholarship for OBC
schemes.nameHindi: अन्य पिछड़ा वर्ग के लिए पोस्ट मैट्रिक छात्रवृत्ति
schemes.benefits: Financial assistance for OBC students pursuing higher education
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through National Scholarship Portal (scholarships.gov.in)

schemes.name: Mukhyamantri Kanya Sumangala Yojana
schemes.benefits: ₹15,000 in installments for girl child from birth to graduation
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply online at mksy.up.gov.in or through Anganwadi centers

schemes.name: Free Silai Machine Yojana
schemes.benefits: Free sewing machine for women to start self-employment
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through district social welfare office or state government portal

schemes.name: PM-KUSUM Solar Pump Scheme
schemes.benefits: 90% subsidy on solar pump installation for farmers
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through state nodal agency or online at pmkusum.mnre.gov.in

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maandhan
schemes.benefits: Guaranteed monthly pension of ₹3,000 after age 60 for unorganized workers
schemes.applicationProcess: Enroll through Common Service Centre (CSC) or online at maandhan.in

schemes.name: One Nation One Ration Card
schemes.benefits: Access subsidized food grains from any ration shop across India
schemes.applicationProcess: Automatic - link Aadhaar with ration card at nearest fair price shop
